definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Qin Shan people, with great mind, are stretch out their arms greeting friends from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 秦山人以博大胸懷，張開雙臂迎接世界朋友的到來。

sentences.english: The Chinese literature is broad and profound.
sentences.chinese: 中國文學是博大精深的。

sentences.english: Baotou by car from the northbound carriageway, the Guyang County on the Prairie into the Bayan Obo.
sentences.chinese: 由包頭乘車北行，過固陽縣就進入白雲鄂博大草原了。

sentences.english: Dalian boda office furniture co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 大連博大辦公傢俱有限公司。

sentences.english: The law science, as a social science, has a long-term history and rich contents.
sentences.chinese: 法律科學作爲一門社會科學，歷史久遠，博大精深。

sentences.english: Chinese ancient poetry is like a boundless sea with its charms.
sentences.chinese: 中國古詩詞博大精深，蘊涵着豐富的藝術魅力。

sentences.english: This is my caritative and warmhearted motherland.
sentences.chinese: 這是我博大而溫情的祖國。

sentences.english: There are many kinds of traditional moral rules in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國傳統道德卷帙浩繁，博大精深。

sentences.english: The brilliant Big Buddha at Nanshan Mountain helps indicate the magnitude and profundity of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 金碧輝煌的南山大佛展現了中華文明的博大精深。

sentences.english: With great wisdom and broad bosom.
sentences.chinese: 依憑博大的智慧和寬廣的胸懷。

sentences.english: Ran into broad in its long, but "there are cases of unification of the will of a million."
sentences.chinese: 然在其久遠博大之中，卻“統之有宗，會之有元”。

sentences.english: In Tianyuan, we feel life is full of energy.
sentences.chinese: 在田園，我們感受着生命的博大。

sentences.english: Taiji had several hundred years historical in China, it's great and profound.
sentences.chinese: 太極在中國己有幾百年的歷史，博大精深。

sentences.english: Asian nations have long known about the greatness of ancient Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲國家很早以前就知道古代中國文化的博大。

sentences.english: Zhouyi is the origin of Chinese traditional culture because of its profoundness.
sentences.chinese: 周易》內容博大精深，是中國幾千年傳統文化的淵源。

definition: all rivers run into the sea/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)
receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
